[Groovy] Class GPathXmlHttpMessageConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.http.converter.AbstractHttpMessageConverter
      org.grails.datastore.gorm.rest.client.xml.GPathXmlHttpMessageConverter

@groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class GPathXmlHttpMessageConverter
extends org.springframework.http.converter.AbstractHttpMessageConverter

A org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageConverter for converting responses to a GPathResult
